metadata.notes: Filtered to 7 true brand activations. Removed 18 store openings.

events.title: Today at Apple Creative Sessions Expansion
events.description: Expanded Today at Apple program offering free creative skills workshops, coding classes, and photography sessions in all retail locations.
events.activation: Stores host daily creative sessions including photo walks, music production workshops, coding classes for kids, and artist collaborations with local creators.
events.promotionMethods: Apple app promotions, email invitations, in-store signage, creator partnerships, community organization collaborations

events.title: Urban Outfitters Nike On Rotation Experience
events.description: Immersive in-store Nike experience through Urban Outfitters' 'On Rotation' retail format, designed to fuel inspiration and discovery for Gen Z consumers with rotating Nike collections.
events.activation: Dedicated Nike sections with curated sneaker and apparel rotations, immersive brand storytelling, Gen Z-focused merchandising, integrated with Urban Outfitters' lifestyle aesthetic.

events.title: Flatiron Flagship Remodel & Activation Series
events.description: 2,200-square-foot remodeled flagship featuring rotating three-month activations. Started with Grey Days celebrating signature color, transitioned to Found In New York series with In Bloom (Brooklyn artist CJ Hendry + Brooklyn Grange Farm) and Subway Series (five boroughs tribute).
events.activation: Open area consistently evolving with latest collaborations, events, launches and activations. Grey Days pop-up, In Bloom experiential art, Subway Series cultural tribute, and regular community partnerships with local creators.

events.title: SoHo Flagship with Denim Atelier
events.description: 6,500-square-foot flagship with men's and women's collections. Features first-of-its-kind Denim Atelier for personalized fittings and social media-optimized space. Within ten-block radius, sidewalk stickers lead to museum-style installations in vacant storefronts.
events.activation: Denim Atelier booking appointments (individual or group) with specialized lighting and mirrors for social media photos, free drinks, personalized fitting services, sidewalk stickers and museum-style vacant storefront installations, immersive spring campaign integration.

events.title: NYC Wedding Pop-Up with Pinterest
events.description: Immersive wedding-themed pop-up showcasing Anthropologie Weddings bridal collection in partnership with Pinterest. Featured decor and lifestyle products from AnthroLiving and Terrain, open by appointment through February 4, 2024.
events.activation: Immersive wedding trend showcase, Pinterest trend integration, appointment-based exclusive access, cross-brand curation from URBN portfolio (AnthroLiving, Terrain), wedding registry experience, and personalized bridal consultation environment.

events.title: Malibu Design Shop Concept
events.description: 2,250-square-foot showroom-style Design Shop, one-quarter the size of average CB2. Features exclusive few-of-a-kind furniture, vintage pieces, live plants, and little luxuries. Hosts CB2 Shop Talk programming with designer events and panel discussions.
events.activation: CB2 Shop Talk programming with designer meet and greets, design demonstrations, panel discussions with CB2 experts, trade member services, vintage furniture curation, live plant offerings, and creative hub for home inspiration.

events.title: Warby Parker Shop-in-Shop Partnership
events.location: Five locations (IL, MN, NJ, OH, PA)
events.description: Strategic partnership bringing Warby Parker shop-in-shops to five Target locations with full suite of products and services including glasses, sunglasses, contacts, eye exams, and vision tests. Staffed by Warby Parker employees with prices starting at $95 including prescription lenses.
events.activation: Dedicated Warby Parker sections within Target stores, full optical services including eye exams and vision tests, Warby Parker staff providing personalized service, integrated Target and Warby Parker brand experience, accessible eyewear at Target locations.
events.promotionMethods: Grand opening events at each location, Target Circle member promotions, eye exam introductory offers, partnership co-marketing campaigns, local community vision health events
